author: Subhajit Ganguly

resources.description: The dataset refers to ambient water quality of Ground Water in 2008. The minimum, maximum and mean values of water quality parameters like Temperature, Dissolved Oxygen(D.O.), pH, Conductivity, Biochemical Oxygen Demand(B.O.D), Nitrate-N and Nitrite-N, Fecal Coliform and Total Coliform are given in the dataset. The data is sourced from Status of Water quality in India - 2008.
resources.name: Water quality of Ground Water - 2008

organization.description:
India specific data
For visualizations, please visit: http://in.okfn.org/visualized-data/
organization.title: India Data
organization.name: india

title: Water quality of Ground Water - 2008
